author: sky.cactus
content: We fixed the problem where it would get stuck below 7 I believe.  You are correct it can't cross below 7, but just as a side effect, not as an intended function.

author: sky.cactus
content: I'm a fan of testing behavior below 7, just for thoroughness and ensuring consensus, even though it isn't reachable in production.

author: sky.cactus
content: e.g., set to 0, make sure it walks up from there.

author: marekm3498
content: We hardcoded the base Fee for state tests, but I think it will be worth reading it from the env section like <@!393119312350543872> wrote.

author: holiman
content: But then I guess you only hardcoded it in one state-test path, not the other? Because when I run them through nethtest, it uses `0`
